response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal projects. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $15,000. However, to facilitate a transaction, I am proposing an offer of $20,000 for this product.
